oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Combining physical and cultural weed control with biological methods – prospects for integrated non-chemical weed management strategies
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hatcher, Scientist Paul
Melander, Scientist Bo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper deals with the possibilities of combining physical weed control with biological weed control.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Hatcher, Scientist Paul and Melander, Scientist Bo (2004) Combining physical and cultural weed control with biological methods – prospects for integrated non-chemical weed management strategies. In: Proceedings of the 6th EWRS on Physical and Cultural Weed Control, p. 30.
